author: BitterSweet#1337
description: Parse through trusted repackers' websited for your favourite games.
install_msg:
Usage is `[p]repack <query>` to search.
If you need help or anything please join my server: https://discord.com/invite/ChS8MZDPRA
short: Search safe repackers like KaOsKrew, FitGirl and Scooter.
